remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认实现调用对象上的方法的对象是否有效且目标类型为`string`。The default implementation calls the method on the object if the object is valid and if the destination type is `string`. 如果此方法无法转换为目标类型，它将引发异常。If this method cannot convert to the destination type, it throws a exception.
